author: BetterWang
body:
Update the total number of channels to include the ZDC_RPD for PbPb 2018 data taking.
This fixes the downstream Hcal calibration problem, such as:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/CondFormats/HcalObjects/src/HcalCondObjectContainerBase.cc#L89

@mandrenguyen
title: HcalZDCDetId total number of channels
